definitions.usage_example: I need to find out what time the store closes.
definitions.alternative_example: I need to discover what time the store closes.
definitions.usage_example_es: Necesito averiguar a qué hora cierra la tienda.

definitions.usage_example: He found out that she was lying.
definitions.alternative_example: He learned that she was lying.
definitions.usage_example_es: Él descubrió que ella estaba mintiendo.
